   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_npn_hello_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   26: 
   27: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("ssl/src/tls_record.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("ssl/src/tls_handshake.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_cipher.hrl").
   31: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_internal.hrl").
   32: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   33: 
   34: 
   35: %% Callback functions
   36: -export([all/0,
   37:          init_per_suite/1,
   38:          end_per_suite/1,
   39:          init_per_testcase/2,
   40:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   41: 
   42: %% Testcases
   43: -export([encode_and_decode_npn_client_hello_test/1,
   44:          encode_and_decode_npn_server_hello_test/1,
   45:          encode_and_decode_client_hello_test/1,
   46:          encode_and_decode_server_hello_test/1,
   47:          create_server_hello_with_advertised_protocols_test/1,
   48:          create_server_hello_with_no_advertised_protocols_test/1
   49:         ]).
   50: 
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   53: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   54: all() ->
   55:     [encode_and_decode_npn_client_hello_test,
   56:      encode_and_decode_npn_server_hello_test,
   57:      encode_and_decode_client_hello_test,
   58:      encode_and_decode_server_hello_test,
   59:      create_server_hello_with_advertised_protocols_test,
   60:      create_server_hello_with_no_advertised_protocols_test].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     catch crypto:stop(),
   64:     try crypto:start() of
   65: 	ok ->
   66: 	    Config
   67:     catch _:_ ->
   68: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   69:     end.
   70: 
   71: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   72:     %% This function is required since init_per_suite/1 exists.
   73:     ok.
   74: 
   75: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   76:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
   77:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 5}),
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
   81:     Config.
   82: 
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   85: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   86: 
   87: encode_and_decode_client_hello_test(Config) ->
   88:     HandShakeData = create_client_handshake(undefined),
   89:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
   90:     {[{DecodedHandshakeMessage, _Raw}], _} =
   91: 	tls_handshake:get_tls_handshakes(Version, list_to_binary(HandShakeData), <<>>,
   92:                                         default_options_map()),
   93:     Extensions = DecodedHandshakeMessage#client_hello.extensions,
   94:     #{next_protocol_negotiation := undefined} = Extensions.
   95: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   96: encode_and_decode_npn_client_hello_test(Config) ->
   97:     HandShakeData = create_client_handshake(#next_protocol_negotiation{extension_data = <<>>}),
   98:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
   99:     {[{DecodedHandshakeMessage, _Raw}], _} =
  100: 	tls_handshake:get_tls_handshakes(Version, list_to_binary(HandShakeData), <<>>,
  101:                                         default_options_map()),
  102:     Extensions = DecodedHandshakeMessage#client_hello.extensions,
  103:     #{next_protocol_negotiation := #next_protocol_negotiation{extension_data = <<>>}} = Extensions.
  104: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  105: encode_and_decode_server_hello_test(Config) ->
  106:     HandShakeData = create_server_handshake(undefined),
  107:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  108:     {[{DecodedHandshakeMessage, _Raw}], _} =
  109: 	tls_handshake:get_tls_handshakes(Version, list_to_binary(HandShakeData), <<>>,
  110:                                         default_options_map()),
  111:     Extensions = DecodedHandshakeMessage#server_hello.extensions,
  112:     #{next_protocol_negotiation := undefined} = Extensions.
  113: 
  114: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: encode_and_decode_npn_server_hello_test(Config) ->
  116:     HandShakeData = create_server_handshake(#next_protocol_negotiation{extension_data = <<6, "spdy/2">>}),
  117:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  118:     {[{DecodedHandshakeMessage, _Raw}], _} =
  119: 	tls_handshake:get_tls_handshakes(Version, list_to_binary(HandShakeData), <<>>,
  120:                                         default_options_map()),
  121:     Extensions = DecodedHandshakeMessage#server_hello.extensions, 
  122:     ?CT_LOG("~p ~n", [Extensions]),
  123:     #{next_protocol_negotiation := #next_protocol_negotiation{extension_data = <<6, "spdy/2">>}} = Extensions.
  124: 
  125: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  126: create_server_hello_with_no_advertised_protocols_test(_Config) ->
  127:     Hello = ssl_handshake:server_hello(<<>>, ?SSL_3_0, create_connection_states(), #{}),
  128:     Extensions = Hello#server_hello.extensions,
  129:     #{} = Extensions.
  130: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  131: create_server_hello_with_advertised_protocols_test(_Config) ->
  132:     Hello = ssl_handshake:server_hello(<<>>, ?SSL_3_0, create_connection_states(),
  133: 				       #{next_protocol_negotiation => [<<"spdy/1">>, <<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}),
  134:     Extensions = Hello#server_hello.extensions,
  135:     #{next_protocol_negotiation := [<<"spdy/1">>, <<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]} = Extensions.
  136: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  137: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  138: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  139: create_client_handshake(Npn) ->
  140:     Vsn = {1, 2},
  141:     tls_handshake:encode_handshake(#client_hello{
  142: 				      client_version = Vsn,
  143: 				      random = <<1:256>>,
  144: 				      session_id = <<>>,
  145: 				      cipher_suites = [?TLS_DHE_DSS_WITH_DES_CBC_SHA],
  146: 				      compression_methods = "",
  147: 				      extensions = #{next_protocol_negotiation => Npn,
  148: 						      renegotiation_info => #renegotiation_info{}}
  149: 				     }, Vsn).
  150: 
  151: create_server_handshake(Npn) ->
  152:     Vsn = {1, 2},
  153:     tls_handshake:encode_handshake(#server_hello{
  154: 				      server_version = Vsn,
  155: 				      random = <<1:256>>,
  156: 				      session_id = <<>>,
  157: 				      cipher_suite = ?TLS_DHE_DSS_WITH_DES_CBC_SHA,
  158: 				      compression_method = 1,
  159: 				      extensions = #{next_protocol_negotiation => Npn,
  160:                                                      renegotiation_info => #renegotiation_info{}}
  161: 				     }, Vsn).
  162: 
  163: create_connection_states() ->
  164:     #{pending_read => #{security_parameters => #security_parameters{
  165: 						  server_random = <<1:256>>,
  166: 						  compression_algorithm = 1,
  167: 						  cipher_suite = ?TLS_DHE_DSS_WITH_DES_CBC_SHA
  168: 						 }
  169: 		       },
  170:       current_read => #{secure_renegotiation => false
  171:                        }
  172:      }.
  173: 
  174: default_options_map() ->
  175:     ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_none}], client, #{}).
